name: third-party-web
description: Categorized data on third party entities on the web.

scripts.build:www: cd www/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: node bin/convert-entities-db.js && node bin/generate-canonical-domain-csv.js && node bin/build-entity-json-files.js && node bin/generate-sql.js && generate-export-aliases
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit

author: Patrick Hulce <patrick.hulce@gmail.com>
